titles.title: Small Business Administration Supplemental Appropriations Act for Fiscal Year 1993
To make supplemental appropriations for fiscal year 1993 for the general business guaranteed loans program of the Small Business Administration.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Appropriations.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1112-1113)

bill.summary: 4/29/1993--Introduced. Small Business Administration Supplemental Appropriations Act for Fiscal Year 1993 - Appropriates supplemental funds for FY 1993 for the business loans program account of the Small Business Administration (providing guaranteed loans to certain qualifying small businesses).
